thread.title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- MasTec, Inc./
thread.title_full: /C O R R E C T I O N -- MasTec, Inc./

title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- MasTec, Inc./
text:
Close 
In the news release, MasTec Senior Management to Present at Citigroup Industrials Investor Conference in Boston, issued 04-Sep-2015 by MasTec, Inc. over PR Newswire, we are advised by the company that the first paragraph, first sentence, should read "9:30 a.m. Eastern time" rather than "11:00 a.m. Eastern time" as the conference schedule has been changed by the sponsor. The complete, corrected release follows: MasTec Senior Management to Present at Citigroup Industrials Investor Conference in Boston 
  4,   (NYSE: MTZ)   Boston presenting at the Citigroup Industrials   17th, at approximately 9:30 a.m.   
 citigroup-industrials-investor-conference-in-boston-300135655.html 
SOURCE MasTec, Inc. 
J. Marc Lewis, Vice President-Investor Relations, 305-406-1815, 305-406-1886 fax, marc.lewis@mastec.com
